name: Mr. Douchebag Breaks Rocks
summary:
Mr. Douchebag Breaks Rocks is a cancelled Flash game that was developed by Maker Studios for release on Ray William Johnson's website in 2011. Nothing is known about the game apart from the fact it was based on the character of Mr. Douchebag from Ray's Your Favorite Martian series.

The game was advertised on Ray's website from November 2011 to January 2012, where the coming soon notice for the game was removed.
